::Zardus/Prowl::

Zardus nods. "Exelent."

"Computer, weapons," He says a bit louder and a panel emerges from a wall, 
featuring a display of weapons. Zardus takes out a launcher and straps it to 
his back.

"Ok, let's go," He says to Nemesis, heading off towards the door.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The boulder Prowl was behind explodes and he is blown into a wall of the Ark. 
He rubs his head and tries to stand up, but his leg shorts out.

"Beast Mode!" He says, transforms, and stands up.
